entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:33 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 08:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to plus 2 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few rain showers becoming mixed with flurries this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
